pkgmetadata.longdescription: # llvm_snapshot_builderBuilds LLVM snapshots on Copr## Status[![Documentation Status](https://readthedocs.org/projects/llvm_snapshot_builder/badge/?version=latest)](https://llvm_snapshot_builder.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?badge=latest)[![CodeQL](https://github.com/kwk/llvm_snapshot_builder/actions/workflows/codeql.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/kwk/llvm_snapshot_builder/actions/workflows/codeql.yml)[![ci-cd](https://github.com/kwk/llvm_snapshot_builder/actions/workflows/ci-cd.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/kwk/llvm_snapshot_builder/actions/workflows/ci-cd.yml)[![codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/kwk/llvm_snapshot_builder/branch/main/graph/badge.svg?token=ASSPTOL3JU)](https://codecov.io/gh/kwk/llvm_snapshot_builder)[![release](https://img.shields.io/github/release/kwk/llvm_snapshot_builder.svg)](https://github.com/kwk/llvm_snapshot_builder/releases)## Installation```bash$ pip install llvm_snapshot_builder```## UsageFor a more in-depth example, take a look at [the example in the documentation](https://llvm_snapshot_builder.readthedocs.io/en/latest/example.html).After installing you can explore the CLI program with:```bash$ python -m llvm_snapshot_builder.cli --help```or with:```console$ llvm_sb --help```## ContributingInterested in contributing?
